articles.title: Virat Kohli comes home due to family emergency; Ruturaj Gaikwad not in South Africa test series - Pune Pulse
articles.description: December 22, 2023 According to BCCI sources, former India captain Virat Kohli, who was in South Africa with the country's Test team, returned home due to a family emergency. The renowned batter is anticipated to arrive back in South Africa, though, in time fo…
articles.content:
December 22, 2023
According to BCCI sources, former India captain Virat Kohli, who was in South Africa with the country’s Test team, returned home due to a family emergency.
